document.full_text: about 1,000 people are believed to have been killed in clashes between supporters and opponents of libyan leader muammar gaddafi, the british government said in a human rights report published on thursday.
document.title: about 1,000 believed killed in libya violence: uk
lines_and_colors: about 1,000 people are believed to have been killed in clashes between supporters and opponents of libyan leader muammar gaddafi, the british government said in a human rights report published on thursday.
